actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to extend for one year the increased deduction for start-up expenditures.
short_title: Jump Start American Small Business Innovation Act of 2011

summary.text: Jump Start American Small Business Innovation Act of 2011 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to extend through 2011 the increased tax deduction for the start-up expenditures of an active trade or business.

titles.title: Jump Start American Small Business Innovation Act of 2011
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to extend for one year the increased deduction for start-up expenditures.
